DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective explore efficacy mometasone furoate nasal spray ( MFNS ) comparison placebo improve quality life subject moderate severe persistent allergic rhinitis intermittent asthma measure Rhinasthma Questionnaire ( Global Summary Score ) . In addition , two secondary objective . The first secondary objective evaluate efficacy MFNS improving quality life subject moderate severe persistent allergic rhinitis intermittent asthma measure Rhinasthma Upper Airways Score , Rhinasthma Lower Airways Score , Rhinasthma Respiratory Allergy Impact Score . The second secondary objective evaluate efficacy MFNS relieve subject 's symptom allergic rhinitis asthma measure Total 5 Symptoms Score ( T5SS ) Global Symptom Score ( T5SS+asthma symptom ) use rescue medication demand .
